CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Pediatric Treatment relative to Rehabilitation Therapy?
SRP.A: Pediatric Treatment is {below} Rehabilitation Therapy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average treatment cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Pediatric Treatment}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average treatment cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Rehabilitation Therapy}.

VE.Q: What is Rehabilitation Therapy's Average Treatment Cost in 1960?
VE.A: Rehabilitation Therapy's average treatment cost in 1960 is {6125.02} $.

VE.Q: What is Rehabilitation Therapy's Average Treatment Cost in 1976?
VE.A: Rehabilitation Therapy's average treatment cost in 1976 is {4359.27} $.

VE.Q: What is Rehabilitation Therapy's Average Treatment Cost in 1979?
VE.A: Rehabilitation Therapy's average treatment cost in 1979 is {5876.83} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Treatment Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average treatment cost is {3511.16} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Treatment Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average treatment cost is {54102.31} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Treatment Cost level recorded for Pediatric Treatment?
What is the lowest Average Treatment Cost level recorded for Pediatric Treatment?
EVJ.A: Pediatric Treatment's lowest recorded level is approximately {5092.81} $ in {1958}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Average Treatment Cost?
SC.A: The average total average treatment cost is {25993.58} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Treatment Cost fall between 22305.96 and 24653.95 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Treatment Cost go below 15123.32 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Treatment Cost exceed 31836.60 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1975, did the total Average Treatment Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total average treatment cost between 1965 and 1975 was {smaller} than between 1967 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1969, was the average total Average Treatment Cost higher or lower than between 1959 and 1967?
NC.A: The average total average treatment cost between 1964 and 1969 was {higher} than between 1959 and 1967.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1982, did the total Average Treatment Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1960 and 1976?
NC.A: The change in total average treatment cost between 1964 and 1982 was {larger} than between 1960 and 1976.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1973, did the total Average Treatment Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1963 and 1974?
NC.A: The change in total average treatment cost between 1962 and 1973 was {smaller} than between 1963 and 1974.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Pediatric Treatment} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Rehabilitation Therapy, Pediatric Treatment}.
